body: @Doffy no you retard the entire point is she's trying to cheat on him, has been cheating on him constantly, and wants to get gangraped, she's a whore

No, the wife was cheating on him way before he did (part-timers conversation, page 7). The motivations of the guy and his old classmate were pretty clear but the whole wife thing felt a bit weird, i didn't know where it was heading to, and then we get that retarded last page. It's as if he autor wanted to not make the reader feel bad for the wife by making her "a whore who loves cocks" os something. I expected more.

I thougth the story was pretty nice...and then came the last page. WTF! They both cheated, but in the end the wife gets randomly raped and punished. Way to go, the author ruined a nice doujin in just one page. So the husband is allowed to cheat but the wife not? And what about this disgusting line that she can't complain about what happens to her? Utter BS!
